most_active_tickets.title: Crash when scrolling or moving a window to another screen

common_issues.title: App Crash on Window Move/Scroll
common_issues.description: Pieces for Developers 4.2.1 on Windows crashes when moving the application window to another screen or scrolling through chat lists/content.  Issue occurs in PiecesOS 12.0.0.  No further reproduction steps available.

related_issues.title: Crash when scrolling or moving a window to another screen
related_issues.text:
Crash when scrolling or moving a window to another screen
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

PiecesOS 12.0.0, Pieces for Developers 4.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I don't know how to provide more info.
Every time I move the app on my left screen, it crashes. Oftentimes when I scroll the chats list or the chat itself, it crashes, too.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate the crash issue related to window movement and scrolling in the Pieces for Developers 4.2.1 application on Windows OS (PiecesOS 12.0.0).  Prioritize this issue due to its frequency and high activity level.
Gather more detailed reproduction steps for the crash issue to aid in debugging and resolution.
Consider reaching out to the user who reported issue #771 to request further information or assistance in reproducing the crash.
